rancher_stack.description: Provides a Rancher Stack resource. This can be used to create and manage stacks on rancher.

environment_id.description: The ID of the environment to create the stack for.

docker_compose.description: The `docker-compose.yml` content to apply for the stack.

rancher_compose.description: The `rancher-compose.yml` content to apply for the stack.

environment.description: The environment to apply to interpret the docker-compose and rancher-compose files.

catalog_id.description: The catalog ID to link this stack to. When provided, `docker_compose` and `rancher_compose` will be retrieved from the catalog unless they are overridden.

scope.description: The scope to attach the stack to. Must be one of **user** or **system**. Defaults to **user**.

start_on_create.description: Whether to start the stack automatically.

finish_upgrade.description: Whether to automatically finish upgrades to this stack.

rendered_docker_compose.description: The interpolated `docker_compose` applied to the stack.

rendered_rancher_compose.description: The interpolated `rancher_compose` applied to the stack.
